Sentencas: Based on the density functional theory (DFT), we evaluate the effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia (c-ZrO2) and its interfaces with metals (Ni, Cu).
Titulo: Effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia and its interfaces with metals

Sentencas: It is observed that, at low concentration, sulfur atoms have the tendency to locate at the zirconia surface, while at high concentration (similar to 23.0 wt%), homogeneous ZrOS structure can be obtained.
Titulo: Effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia and its interfaces with metals

Sentencas: We further predict that sulfur impurity in c-ZrO2 induces a reduction of the wettability between metals (Cu, Ni) and c-ZrO2.
Titulo: Effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia and its interfaces with metals

Sentencas: Thus, for Cu(011)/ZrO2(011) and Ni(011)/ZrO2(011) interfaces, the predicted reductions of the work of separations are up to 53%.
Titulo: Effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia and its interfaces with metals

Sentencas: This may have significant effect on the degradation of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance, when sulfur-containing fuels are used.
Titulo: Effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia and its interfaces with metals

Sentencas: The computational schemes developed in this study are useful for the search for more sulfur-tolerant metal/ceramic anode systems.
Titulo: Effect of sulfur impurity on the stability of cubic zirconia and its interfaces with metals
